name: Etihad Airways
goal:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the United Arab Emirates, flies to over 120 passenger and cargo destinations worldwide from its base in Abu Dhabi.

Etihad Airways is part of the Etihad Aviation group that also holds minority equity investments in airberlin, Air Seychelles, Virgin Australia, Air Serbia, Jet Airways and Alitalia, and in Swiss-based Etihad Regional, operated by Darwin Airline.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Fair competition; Single European Skies; Climate Change; foreign direct investment, Strategic Aviation Package
